code: import React from'react';import TopNavigation from"./TopNavigation";import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){let navigate=useNavigate();let storeObj=useSelector(store=>{return store;});let deleteAccount=async()=>{let dataToSend=new FormData();dataToSend.append("email",storeObj.userDetails.email);let requestOptions={method:"DELETE",body:dataToSend};let JSONData=await fetch("/deleteAccount",requestOptions);let JSOData=await JSONData.json();console.log(JSOData);alert(JSOData.msg);if(JSOData.status==="success"){navigate("/");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopNavigation,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Welcome ",storeObj.userDetails.firstName," ",storeObj.userDetails.lastName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"",src:"/".concat(storeObj.userDetails.profilePic)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{deleteAccount();},children:"Delete Account"})]});}export default Dashboard;
